name: Bit Hunters (Demo)
description:
This is a management game where you lead a group of monster hunters in defense of a town being mysteriously targeted by evil forces.

Make important choices, gather powerful equipment and recruit the best hunters possible, and maybe you'll manage to uncover a few secrets...

-------------------------------------------

  • How to play:

Before choosing your quest, pick your hunters in the "Squad" menu, then equip them  in the "Equip" menu.

Gray quests change daily, while yellow ones are available for a few days.

Be aware that terrible things will happen if you don't complete red quests in time!

-------------------------------------------

I started developing this game in november 2020, so it is still in quite an early stage. Despite this, most of the core features are present, but in need of polish and testing.
